Translations.Text: Tuaa-seen-meem
Yeh aayaten roshan kitab ki hain
Inn kay eman na laaney per shayad aap to apni jaan kho den gay
Agar hum chahatay to inn per aasman say koi aisi nishani utartay kay jiss kay samney inn ki gardaney khum ho jatin
Aur inn kay pass rehman ki taraf say jo bhi naee naseehat aaee yeh uss say roo-gardani kerney walay bann gaye
Inn logon ney jhutlaya hai abb inn kay pass jaldi say iss ki khabren aajyen gi jiss kay sath woh maskhara pann ker rahey hain
Kiya enhon ney zamin per nazaren nahi daalen? Kay hum ney iss mein her tarah kay nafees joray kiss qadar ugaye hain
Be-shak iss mein yaqeenan nishani hai aur inn mein kay aksar log momin nahi hain
Aur tera rab yaqeenan wohi ghalib aur meharbaan hai
Aur jabb aap kay rab ney musa (alh-e-salam) ko aawaz di kay tu zalim qom kay pass jaa
Qom-e-firaon kay pass kiya woh perhezgari na keren gay
Musa (alh-e-salam) ney kaha meray perwerdigar! Mujhay to khof hai kay kahin woh mujhay jhutla (na) den
Aur mera seena tang horaha hai meri zaban chal nahi rahi pus tu haroon ki taraf bhi (wahee) bhej
Aur unn ka meray aik qasoor ka (dawa) bhi hai mujhay darr hai kay kahin woh mujhay maar na dalen
Janab-e-baari ney farmaya! Hergiz aisa na hoga tum dono humari nishaniyan ley ker jao hum khud sunnay walay tumharay sath hain
Tum dono firaon kay pass ja ker kaho kay bila shuba hum rab-ul-aalamaeen kay bhejay huye hain
Kay tu humaray sath bani israeel ko rawana ker dey
Fairaon ney kaha kiya hum ney tujhay teray bachpan kay zamaney mein apnay haan nahi pala tha? Aur tu ney apni umar kay boht say saal hum mein nahi guzaray
Phir tu apna woh kaam ker gaya jo ker gaya aur tu na shukro mein hai
(hazrat) musa (alh-e-salam) ney jawab diya kay mein ney uss kaam ko uss waqt kiya tha jabkay mein raah bhoolay huye logon mein say tha
Phir tum say khof kha ker mein tum mein say bhaag gaya phir mujhay meray rab ney hukum-o-ilm ata farmaya aur mujhay apnay payghumbaron mein say ker diya
Mujh per tera kiya yehi woh ehsan hai? Jissay tu jata raha hai kay tu ney bani israeel ko ghulam bana rakha hai
Firaon ney kaha rab-ul-aalameen kiya cheez hai
(hazrat) musa (alh-e-salam) ney farmaya woh aasamano aur zamin aur inn kay darmiyan ki tamam cheezon ka rab hai agar tum yaqeen rakhney walay ho
Firaon ney apney ird-gird walon say kaha kay kiya tum sunn nahi rahey
(hazrat) musa (alh-e-salam) ney farmaya woh tumhara aur tumharay aglay baap dadon ka perwerdigar hai
Firaon ney kaha (logo!) tumhara yeh rasool jo tumhari taraf bheja gaya hai yeh to yaqeenan deewana hai
(hazrat) musa (alh-e-salam) ney farmaya! Wohi mashriq-o-maghrib ka aur inn kay darmiyan ki tamam cheezon ka rab hai agar tum aqal rakhtay ho
Firaon kehney laga sunn ley! Agar tu ney meray siwa kissi aur ko mabood banaya tu mein tujhay qaidiyon mein daal doon ga
Musa (alh-e-salam) ney kaha agar cheh mein teray pass koi khulli cheez ley aaon
Firaon ney kaha agar tum sachon mein say hai to issay paish ker
Aap ney (ussi waqt) apni laathi daal di jo achanak khullam khulla (zabardast) azdaha bann gaee
Aur apna hath khench nikala to woh bhi ussi waqt her dekhney walay ko safaid chamkeela nazar aaney laga
Firaon apnay aas pass kay sardaron say kehney laga bhaee yeh to koi bara dana jadoogar hai
Yeh to chahata hai kay apnay jadoo kay zor say tumhen tumhari sirzameen say nikal dey batao abb tum kiya hukum detay ho
Unn sab ney kaha aap issay aur iss kay bhai ko mohlat dijiye aur tamam shehron mein harkaaray bhej dijiye
Jo aap kay pass zee ilm jadoogaron ko ley aayen
Phir aik muqarrara din kay waday per tamam jadoogar jama kiye gaye
Aur aam logon say bhi keh diya gaya kay tum bhi majmay mein hazir hojao gay
Takay agar jadoogar ghalib aajayen to hum unhi ki pairwee keren
Jadoogar agar firaon say kehney lagay kay agar hum jeet gaye to humen kuch inam bhi milay ga
Firaon ney kaha haan! (bari khushi say) bulkay aisi soorat mein tum meray khas darbari bann jao gay
(hazrat) musa (alh-e-salam) ney jadoogaron say farmaya jo kuch tumhen dalna hai daal do
Unhon ney apni rassiyan aur laathiyan daal den aur kehney lagay izzat firaon ki qasam! Hum yaqeenan ghalib hi rahen gay
Abb (hazrat) musa (alh-e-salam) ney bhi apni laathi maidan mein daal di jiss ney ussi waqt unn kay jhoot moot kay kartab ko nigalna shuroo ker diya
Yeh dekhtay hi jadoogar bay ikhtiyar sajday mein gir gaye
Aur unhon ney saaf keh diya kay hum to Allah rab-ul-aalameen per eman laye
Yani musa (alh-e-salam) aur haroon kay rab per

Firaon ney kaha kay meri ijazat say pehlay tum iss per eman ley aaye? Yaqeenan yehi tumhara woh bara (sardar) hai jiss ney tum sab ko jadoo sikhaya hai so tumhen abhi abhi maloom ho jaye ga qasam hai mein abhi tumharay haath paon ultay tor per kaat doon ga aur tum sab ko sooli per latka doon ga
Unhon ney kaha koi haraj nahi hum to apnay rab ki taraf lotney walay hain hi
Iss bina per kay hum sab say pehlay eman walay banay hain humen umeed parti hai kay humara rab humari sab khatayen moaaf farma dey ga
Aur hum ney musa ko wahee ki kay raaton raat meray bandon ko nikal ley chal tum sab peecha kiye jao gay
Firaon ney shehron mein harkaaron ko bhej diya
Kay yaqeenan yeh giroh boht hi kum tadaad mein hai
Aur iss per yeh humen sakht gazab-naak ker rahey hain
Aur yaqeenan hum bari jamaat hain inn say chokanna rehnay walay
Bil-aakhir hum ney enhen baghaat say aur chashmon say
Aur khazano say. Aur achay achay muqamaat say nikal bahir kiya
Issi tarah hua aur hum ney unn (tamam) cheezon ka waris bani israeel ko bana diya
Pus fiaroni sooraj nikaltay hi unn kay taaqqub mein niklay
Pus jab dono ney aik doosray ko dekh liya to musa kay saathiyon ney kaha hum to yaqeenan pakar liye gaye
Musa ney kaha hergiz nahi. Yaqeen mano mera rab meray sath hai jo zaroor mujhay raah dikhaye ga
Hum ney musa ki taraf wahee bheji kay darya per apni laathi maar pus ussi waqt darya phat gaya aur her aik hissa paani ka misil baray pahar kay hogaya
Aur hum ney ussi jagah doosron ko nazdeek laa khara ker diya
Aur musa (alh-e-salam) ko aur uss kay tamam saathiyon ko nijat dey di
Phir aur sab doosron ko dobo diya
Yaqeenan iss mein bari ibrat hai aur inn mein kay aksar log eman walay nahi
Aur be-shak aap ka rab bara hi ghalib aur meharbaan hai
Enhen ibrahim (alh-e-salam) ka waqiya bhi suna do
Jabkay unhon ney apnay baap aur pani qom say farmaya kay tum kiss ki ibadat kertay ho
Unhon ney jawab diya kay ibadat kertay hain buton ki hum to barbar inn kay mujawar bann bethay hain
Aap ney farmaya jab tum enhen pukartay ho to kiya woh suntay bhi hain
Ya tumhen nafa nuksan bhi phoncha saktay hain
Unhon ney kaha yeh (hum kuch nahi jantay) hum ney to apnay baap dadon ko issi tarah kertay paya
Aap ney farmaya kuch khabar bhi hai jinhen tum pooj rahey ho
Tum aur tumharay aglay baap dada woh sab meray dushman hain
Ba-juz sachay Allah Taalaa kay jo tamam jahaan ka palanhaar hai
Jiss ney mujhay peda kiya hai aur wohi meri rehbari farmata hai
Wohi hai jo mujhay khilata pilata hai
Aur jab mein beemar par jaon to mujhay shifa ata farmata hai
Aur wohi mujhay maar dalay ga phir zinda ker dey ga
Aur jiss say umeed bandhi hui hai kay woh roz-e-jaza mein meray gunahon ko bakhsh dey ga
Aey meray rab! Mujhay qooat-e-faisla ata farma aur mujhay nek logon mein mila dey
Aur mera ziker-e-khair pichlay logon mein bhi baqi rakh
Mujhay nematon wali jannat kay warison mein say bana dey
Aur meray baap ko bakhsh dey yaqeenan woh gumrahon mein say tha
Aur jiss sin kay log doobara jilaye jayen mujhay ruswa na ker
Jiss din kay maal aur aulad kuch kaam na aaye gi
Lekin faeeday wala wohi hoga jo Allah Taalaa kay samney bay aib dil ley ker jaye
Aur perhezgaron kay liye jannat bilkul nazdeek laa di jaye gi
Aur gumrah logon kay liye jahannum zahir ker di jaye gi
Aur unn say poocha jayega kay jin ki tum pooja kertay rahey woh kahan hain
Jo Allah Taalaa kay siwa thay kiya woh tumhari madad kertay hain? Ya koi badla ley saktay hain
Pus woh sab aur kul gumrah log jahannum mein ondhay mun daal diye jayen gay
Aur iblees kay tamam kay tamam lashkar bhi wahan
Aapas mein lartay jhagartay huye kahen gay
Kay qasam Allah ki! Yaqeenan hum to khulli ghalati per thay
Jabkay tumhen rab-ul-aalameen kay barabar samajh bethay thay
Aur humen to siwa inn badkaaron kay kissi aur ney gumrah nahi kiya tha
Abb to humara koi sifarshi bhi nahi
Aur na koi (sacha) ghum khuwar dost
Agar kaash kay humen aik martaba phir jana milta to hum pakkay sachay momin bann jatay
Yeh majra yaqeena aik bari zabardast nishani hai inn mein say aksar log eman laney walay nahi
Yaqeenan aap ka perwerdigar hi ghalib meharbaan hai
Qom-e-nooh ney bhi nabiyon ko jhutlaya
Jabkay unn kay bhai nooh (alh-e-salam) ney kaha kay kiya tumhen Allah ka khof nahi
Suno! Mein tumhari taraf Allah ka amanat daar rasool hun
Pus tumhen Allah say darna chahaye aur meri baat manni chahaye
Mein tum say iss per koi ajar nahi chahata mera badla to sirf rab-ul-aalameen kay haan hai
Pus tum Allah ka khof rakho aur meri farmanbardari kero
Qom ney jawab diya kay kiya hum tujh per eman layen! Teri tabey daari to razeel logon ney ki hai
Aap ney farmaya! Mujhay kiya khabar kay woh pehlay kiya kertay rahey
Unn ka hisab to meray rab kay zimmay hai agar tumhen shaoor ho to
Mein eman walon ko dhakkay denay wala nahi
Mein to saaf tor per dara denay wala hun
Unhon ney kaha aey nooh! Agar tu baaz na aaya to yaqeenan tujhay sangsaar ker diya jaye ga
Aap ney kaha aey meray perwerdigar! Meri qom ney mujhay jhutla diya
Pus tu mujh mein aur inn mein koi qataee faisla ker dey aur mujha aur meray ba-emaan saathiyon ko nijat dey
Chunacha hum ney ussay aur uss kay saathiyon ko bhari hui kashti mein (sawar kera ker) nijat dey di
Bad-e-azan baqi kay tamam logon ko hum ney dobo diya
Yaqeenan iss mein boht bari ibrat hai. Unn mein say aksar log eman laney walay thay bhi nahi
Aur be-shak aap ka perwerdigar albatta wohi hai zabardast reham kerney wala
Aadiyon ney bhi rasoolon ko jhutlaya
Jabkay unn say unn kay bhai hood ney kaha kay kiya tum dartay nahi
Mein tumhara amanatdaar payghumbar hun
Pus Allah say daro aur mera kaha mano
Mein iss per tum say koi ujrat talab nahi kerta mera sawab to tamam jahaan kay perwerdigar kay pass hi hai
Kiya tum aik aik teelay per bator khel tamasha yaadgar (emaarat) bana rahey ho
Aur bari san’at walay (mazboot mehal tameer) ker rahey ho goya kay tum hamesha yahin raho gay
Aur jab kissi per hath daaltay ho to sakhti aur zulm say pakartay ho
Allah say daro aur meri pairwee kero
Uss say daro jiss ney unn cheezon say tumhari imdad ki jinhen tum jantay ho
Uss ney tumahri madad ki maal say aur aulad say
Baghaat say aur chashmon say
Mujhay to tumhari nisbat baray din kay azab ka andesha hai
Unhon ney kaha kay aap waaz kehn ya waaz kehney walon mein na hon hum per yaksan hai
Yeh to bus puraney logon ki aadat hai
Aur hum hergiz azab nahi diye jayen gay
Chunkay aadiyon ney hazrat hood ko jhutlaya iss liye hum ney unhen tabah ker diya yaqeenan iss mein nishani hai aur inn mein say aksar bey eman thay
Be-shak aap ka rab wohi hai ghalib meharbaan
Samoodiyon ney bhi payghumbaron ko jhutlaya
Unn kay bhai saleh ney unn say farmaya kay kiya tum Allah say nahi dartay
Mein tumhari taraf Allah ka amanatdaar payghumbar hun
To tum Allah say daro aur mera kaha mano
Mein iss per tum say koi ujrat nahi mangta meri ujrat to bus perwerdigar-e-aalam per hi hai
Kiya inn cheezon mein jo yahan hain tum aman kay sath chor diye jao gay
Yaani inn baghon aur inn chashmon
Aur inn kheton aur inn khajooron kay baghon mein jin kay shagoofay naram-o-nazuk hain
Aur tum paharon ko taraash taraash ker pur takalluf makannat bana rahey ho
Pus Allah say daro aur meri ita’at kero
Bey baak hadd say guzar janey walon ki ita’at say baaz aajao
Jo mulk mein fasad phela rahey hain aur islah nahi kertay
Woh bolay kay bus tu unn mein say hai jin per jadoo ker diya gaya hai
Tu to hum jaisa insan hai. Agar tu sachon say hai to koi moajza ley aa
Aap ney farmaya yeh hai oontni pani peenay ki aik bari iss ki aur aik muqarrar din ki bari pani peenay ki tumhari
(khabardar!) issay buraee say hath na lagana werna aik baray bhari din ka azab tumhari girift ker ley ga
Phir bhi enhon ney uss ki koonchen kaat daalen bus woh pasheymaan hogaye
Aur azab ney unhen aa dabocha. Be-shak iss mein ibrat hai. Aur inn mein say aksar log momin na thay
Aur be-shak aap ka rab bara zabardast aur meharbaan hai
Qom-e-loot ney bhi nabiyon ko jhutlaya
Unn say unn kay bhai loot (alh-e-salam) ney kaha kiya tum Allah ka khof nahi rakhtay
Mein tumhari taraf amanatdaar rasool hun
Pus tum Allah Taalaa say daro aur meri ita’at kero
Mein tum say iss per koi badla nahi maangta mera ajar to sirf Allah Taalaa per hai jo tamam jahaan ka rab hai
Kiya tamam jahaan walon mein say mardon kay sath shehwat raani kertay ho
Aur tumahri jin aurton ko Allah Taalaa ney tumhara jora banaya hai unn ko chor detay ho bulkay tum ho hi hadd say guzar janey walay
Unhon ney jawab diya kay aey loot! Agar tu baaz na aaya to yaqeenan nikal diya jayega
Aap ney farmaya mein tumharay kaam say sakht na khush hun
Meray perwerdigar! Mujhay aur meray gharaney ko iss (wabal) say bacha ley jo yeh kertay hain
Pus hum ney ussay aur uss kay mutalaqqeen ko sab ko bacha liya
Ba-juz aik burhiya kay kay woh peechay reh jaaney walon mein ho gaee
Phir hum ney baqi aur sab ko halak ker diya
Aur hum ney unn per aik khas qisam ka meenh barsaya pus boht hi bura meenh tha jo daraye gaye logon per barsa
Yeh majra bhi sirasir ibrat hai. Inn mein say bhi aksat musalman na thay
Be-shak tera perwerdigar wohi hai ghalbay wala meharbaani wala
Aeeka walon ney bhi rasoolon ko jhutlaya
Jabkay inn say shoaib (alh-e-salam) ney kaha kay kiya tumhen darr khof nahi
Mein tumhari tarah amanatdaar rasool hun
Allah ka khof khao aur meri farmanbardari kero
Mein iss per tum say koi ujrat nahi chahata mera ajar tamam jahaano kay paalney walay kay pass hai
Naap poora bhara kero kum denay walon mein shamooliyat na kero
Aur seedhi sahih tarazoo say tola kero
Logon ko unn ki cheezen kami say na do bey baki kay sath zamin mein fasad machatay na phiro
Uss Allah ka khof rakho jiss ney khud tumhen aur agli makhlooq ko peda kiya hai
Unhon ney kaha tu to unn mein say hai jin per jadoo ker diya jata hai
Aur tu to hum hi jaisa aik insan hai aur hum to tujhay jhoot bolney walon mein say hi samajhtay hain
Agar tum sachay logon mein say hai to hum per aasaman kay tukray gira dey
Kaha kay mera rab khoob jannay wala hai jo kuch tum ker rahey ho
Chunkay unhon nay issay jhutlaya to unhen saaibaan walay din kay azab ney pakar liya. Woh baray bhari din ka azab tha
Yaqeena iss mein bari nishani hai aur inn mein kay aksar musalman na thay
Aur yaqeenan tera perwerdigar albatta wohi hai ghalbay wala merharbani wala
Aur be-shak-o-shuba yeh (quran) rab-ul-aalameen ka nazil farmaya hua hai
Issay amanatdaar farishta ley ker aaya hai
Aap kay dil per utra hai kay aap aagah ker denay walon mein say ho jayen
Saaf arabi zaban mein
Aglay nabiyon ki kitabon mein bhi iss quran ka tazkarah hai
Kiya enhen yeh nishani kafi nahi kay haqqaniyat quran ko to bani-israeel kay ulamaa bhi jantay hain
Aur agar hum issay kissi ajami shaks per nazil farmatay
Pus woh inn kay samney iss ki tilawat kerta to yeh issay bawar kerney walay na hotay
Issi tarah hum ney gunehgaron kay dilon mein iss inkar ko dakhil ker diya hai
Woh jab tak dard-naal azabon ko mulahiza na kerlen eman na layen gay
Pus woh azab unn ko na gahan aajaye ga unhen iss ka shaoor bhi na hoga
Uss waqt kahen gay kiya humen kuch mohlat di jayegi
Pus kiya yeh humaray azab ki jaldi macha rahey hain
Acha yeh bhi batao kay agar hum ney enhen kaee saal bhi faeeda uthaney diya
Phir enhen woh azab aa laga jin say yeh dhamkaye jatay thay
To jo kuch bhi yeh barattay rahey iss mein say kuch bhi faeeda na phoncha sakay ga
Hum ney kissi basti ko halak nahi kiya hai magar issi haal mein kay uss kay liye daraney walay thay
Naseehat kay tor per aur hum zulm kerney walay nahi hain
Iss quran ko shetan nahi laye
Aur na woh iss qabil hain na unhen iss ki taqat hai
Bulkay woh to sunnay say bhi mehroon ker diye gaye hain
Pus tu Allah kay sath kissi aur mabood ko na pukar kay tu bhi saza paney walon mein say ho jaye
Apnay qareebi rishtay walon ko dara dey
Uss kay sath farotni say paisa aa jo bhi eman laaney wala ho ker teri tabey daari keray
Agar yeh log teri na farmani keren to tu elaan ker dey kay mein inn kamon say beyzaar hun jo tum ker rahey ho
Apna poora bharosa ghalib meharbaan Allah per rakh
Jo tujhay dekhta rehta hai jabkay tu khara hota hai
Aur sajda kerney walon kay darmiyan tera ghoomna phirna bhi
Woh bara hi sunnay wala aur khoob jannay wala hai
Kiya mein tumhen bataon kay shetan kiss per utartay hain
Woh her aik jhootay gunehgaar per utartay hain
(uchat’ti) hui suni sunaee phoncha detay hain aur inn mein say aksar jhootay hain
Shaeeron ki pairwee woh kertay hain jo behkay huye hon
Kiya aap ney nahi dekha kay shaeer aik aik bayabaan mein sir takratay phirtay hain
Aur woh kehtay hain jo kertay nahi

Siwaye unn kay jo eman laye aur nek amal kiye aur ba-kasrat Allah Taalaa ka ziker kiya aur apni mazloomi kay baad intiqam liya jinhon ney zulm kiya hai woh bhi abhi jaan len gay kay kiss kerwat ulat’tay hain
